plot: When jockey Porky's thoroughbred gets drunk on linament, a goofy milk-wagon horse takes over for the big race.
title: Porky's Prize Pony
plot_es: When jockey Porky's thoroughbred gets drunk on linament, a goofy milk-wagon horse takes over for the big race.
plot_en: When jockey Porky's thoroughbred gets drunk on linament, a goofy milk-wagon horse takes over for the big race.
